The [93mIR[0m [93mlaser[0m [93mresonantly[0m [93mexcites[0m a [93mphonon[0m of [93mhBN[0m that [33mleads[0m to an ≈[93m800[0m-[93mfold[0m [93menhancement[0m of the [93mSFG[0m [93mintensity[0m, [93mmaking[0m it [93mpossible[0m to [93mimage[0m [93mlarge[0m [93m100[0m × [93m100[0m [93mµm[0m [93m2[0m [93msample[0m [93mareas[0m in [93mless[0m than [93m1[0m [93ms[0m. [93mHeterodyne[0m [93mdetection[0m [95mcombined[0m with [93mazimuthal[0m [93msample[0m [93mrotation[0m [93mfurther[0m [93mprovides[0m [93mfull[0m [93mcrystallographic[0m [93minformation[0m. [95mCombined[0m [93mknowledge[0m of [93mtopography[0m and [93mcrystal[0m [93morientation[0m [93mreveals[0m that [93mtriangular[0m [93mdomains[0m of [93mCVD[0m-[93mgrown[0m [93mmonolayer[0m [93mhBN[0m [93mhave[0m [93mnitrogen[0m-[93mterminated[0m [93mzigzag[0m [93medges[0m. [93mOverall[0m, [93mSFG[0m [93mmicroscopy[0m is an [93multra[0m-[93msensitive[0m [92mtool[0m with the [93mpotential[0m to [93mimage[0m [93mcrystal[0m [93mstructure[0m, [93mstrain[0m, [93mstacking[0m [93msequences[0m, and [93mtwist[0m [93mangles[0m in a [93mwide[0m [93mrange[0m of [93mvan[0m [93mder[0m [93mWaals[0m [93mstructures[0m, where [93mlocating[0m and [93midentifying[0m [93mmonolayer[0m [93mregions[0m and [92minterfaces[0m with [93mbroken[0m [93minversion[0m [93msymmetry[0m is of [93mparamount[0m [93mimportance[0m.
- [93mTheoretical[0m [93mStudies[0m on the [93mLocal[0m [93mStructures[0m and [93mEPR[0m-[93mg[0m [93mFactors[0m for the [93mOrthorhombic[0m [93mCu[0m([93m2[0m+) [93mCenters[0m in [93mGdBa[0m([93m2[0m)[93mCu[0m([93m3[0m)[93mO[0m([93m7[0m-[93mΔ[0m) and [93mLa[0m([93m0[0m.[93m5[0m)[93mGd[0m([93m0[0m.[93m5[0m)[93mBa[0m([93m2[0m)[93mCu[0m([93m3[0m)[93mO[0m([93my[0m).: The [93mlocal[0m [93mstructures[0m and the [93melectron[0m [93mparamagnetic[0m [93mresonance[0m ([93mEPR[0m) [93mg[0m [93mfactors[0m of [93mCu[0m [93m2[0m+ [93mcenters[0m in [93mGdBa[0m [93m2[0m [93mCu[0m [93m3[0m [93mO[0m [93m7[0m-[93mΔ[0m and [93mLa[0m [93m0[0m.[93m5[0m [93mGd[0m [93m0[0m.[93m5[0m [93mBa[0m [93m2[0m [93mCu[0m [93m3[0m [93mO[0m [93my[0m are [93mtheoretically[0m [93mstudied[0m by [93musing[0m the [93mperturbation[0m [93mformulas[0m of the [93mg[0m [93mfactors[0m for an [93morthorhombically[0m [93melongated[0m [93moctahedral[0m [93m3d[0m [93m9[0m [93mcluster[0m. In these [93mformulas[0m, the [93mcrystal[0m-[93mfield[0m [93mparameters[0m ([93mCFPs[0m) are [93mdetermined[0m from the [93msuperposition[0m [92mmodel[0m and the [93mlocal[0m [93mdistortions[0m [93mdue[0m to the [93mJahn[0m-[93mTeller[0m ([93mJT[0m) [93meffect[0m. [93mBased[0m on the [93mcalculations[0m, the [93mCu[0m-[93mO[0m [93mbond[0m [93mlengths[0m are [93mfound[0m to [93mexperience[0m the [93maxial[0m [93melongations[0m [93mδz[0m (≈[93m0[0m.[93m052[0m and [93m0[0m.[93m055[0m [93mÅ[0m) [93malong[0m the [93mc[0m-[93maxis[0m and the [93mplanar[0m [93mbond[0m [93mlength[0m [93mvariations[0m [93mδr[0m (≈[93m0[0m.[93m061[0m and [93m0[0m.[93m128[0m [93mÅ[0m) in the [93mperpendicular[0m ([93mab[0m) [93mplane[0m for the [93morthorhombic[0m [93mCu[0m [93m2[0m+ [93mcenters[0m in [93mGdBa[0m [93m2[0m [93mCu[0m [93m3[0m [93mO[0m [93m7[0m-[93mΔ[0m and [93mLa[0m [93m0[0m.[93m5[0m [93mGd[0m [93m0[0m.[93m5[0m [93mBa[0m [93m2[0m [93mCu[0m [93m3[0m [93mO[0m [93my[0m , [93mrespectively[0m.
